item.title: 波兰在关键投票后的首次会议上保持利率稳定
item.description: 波兰国家银行一如预期维持利率不变，投资者重点关注行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）在关键的总统大选后即将发表的言论基调。【原文：The National Bank of Poland kept interest rates on hold, as expected, with investors focusing on the tone of Governor Adam Glapinski’s upcoming comments in the wake of a pivotal presidential election.】

item.title: 印度将从 2027 年 3 月起进行人口普查
item.description: 印度周三表示，它将从 2027 年 3 月开始为新的人口普查收集数据，从而平息了这个南亚国家在推迟四年后何时更新人口信息的不确定性。【原文：India said Wednesday that it will begin gathering data for a new census from March 2027, putting to rest uncertainty about when the South Asian nation will update its demographics information after a delay of four years.】

item.title: 华尔街对宽松资本规则的梦想如何渐行渐近
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在第二个任期伊始就承诺要削减监管。越来越多的迹象表明，这一精简联邦法规的举措可能会实现华尔街的一个长期愿望：放宽对银行的资本要求，特别是补充杠杆率。【原文：US President Donald Trump kicked off his second term promising to slash regulation. There are growing signs that this push to streamline the federal rulebook could fulfill one of Wall Street’s longstanding wishes: an easing of capital requirements for banks, specifically the supplementary leverage ratio.】

item.title: 检察官指控俄罗斯是针对英国境内乌克兰公司纵火袭击的幕后黑手
item.description: 在对被控在本土推动俄罗斯议程的六名男子的审判开始时，检察官称，俄罗斯情报部门是伦敦一家仓库纵火案的幕后黑手，该仓库向乌克兰供应货物，包括太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）旗下的星链（StarLink）卫星设备。【原文：Russian intelligence services were behind an arson attack at a London warehouse that supplied goods to Ukraine, including SpaceX-owned StarLink satellite equipment, prosecutors alleged at the start of a trial against six men accused of pushing Russia’s agenda on home soil.】

item.title: 调查显示：银行将 2025 年油价预测降至 60 美元以下
item.description: 据海恩斯博恩律师事务所（Haynes Boone LLP）的一项调查显示，在欧佩克+增产和原油需求增长持平的情况下，银行将今年的平均油价预期下调至每桶60美元以下。【原文：Banks are cutting estimates for the average oil price this year to below $60 a barrel amid production hikes from OPEC+ and flat crude demand growth, according to a survey from the law firm Haynes Boone LLP.】

item.title: Lucid 签订美国石墨协议，争夺国内电池材料市场
item.description: 汽车制造商 Lucid Group Inc. 签订了第三份美国加工石墨协议，扩大了其电动汽车电池重要组件的国内供应。【原文：Automaker Lucid Group Inc. signed a third agreement for US-processed graphite, extending its bid for domestic supplies of an essential component in its electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: ADP 数据闪现就业疲软迹象，国债收益率下滑
item.description: 周三，美国国债收益率下滑，因为有关美国劳动力市场健康状况的新一轮数据显示，美国劳动力市场更加疲软，这使交易商更加确信美联储将在今年晚些时候恢复降息。【原文：Treasury yields slid on Wednesday as a fresh dose of data on the health of the US labor market signaled more softening, emboldening traders’ view that the Federal Reserve will resume cutting interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯首次公开募股势头面临首次公开募股疲软的挑战
item.description: 黯淡的首次亮相，再加上沙特阿拉伯股市的低迷和两家公司在平行交易所的撤消上市，有可能使这个近年来一直是世界上新股销售最火爆的市场黯然失色。【原文：Dour debuts, combined with a slump in Saudi Arabia’s stocks and two pulled listings on the parallel exchange, threaten to take the sheen off a market that has been among the world’s hottest for new share sales in recent years.】

item.title: 欧盟发布缓解水资源短缺和限制数据中心使用的计划
item.description: 欧盟公布了在整个集团内提高抗旱能力和改善水质的计划，包括对蓬勃发展的 IT 行业进行用量检查的措施。【原文：The European Union unveiled plans to boost resilience to droughts and improve water quality across the bloc, including measures to place usage checks on the booming IT sector.】

item.title: 为什么制造可靠的自动驾驶汽车如此困难？
item.description: 二十年前，美国军方在其具有开创意义的 Darpa 挑战赛中，派出一支刚刚起步的机器人车队穿越莫哈韦沙漠，拉开了制造自动驾驶汽车竞赛的序幕。到 2015 年，自动驾驶汽车技术得到广泛应用，业界盛传无人驾驶汽车很快将无处不在。【原文：Two decades ago, the US military kicked off the race to build self-driving cars by sending a fleet of fledgling robot vehicles across the Mojave Desert in its seminal Darpa challenge. By 2015, autonomous vehicle technology was being widely pursued, and the industry was abuzz with predictions that driverless cars would soon be everywhere.】

item.title: 南非立法者支持预算基础框架
item.description: 南非立法者小组支持国家财政部的财政框架，这是年度预算在两次遭到国家执政联盟部分成员否决后终于获得批准的最新信号。【原文：A panel of South African lawmakers backed the National Treasury’s fiscal framework, the latest signal that the annual budget will finally win approval after twice being rejected by some members of the nation’s governing coalition.】

item.title: 欧盟向中国提出 "令人担忧 "的稀土供应中断问题
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）说，他周二向中国贸易部长王文涛提出了整个行业对中国稀土和磁铁出口限制的担忧。【原文：The European Union’s trade chief, Maros Sefcovic, said he raised industry-wide concerns over Chinese export restrictions on rare earths and magnets with his counterpart Wang Wentao on Tuesday.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 计划斥资 160 亿美元提高美国芯片产量
item.description: 美国最大的定制芯片供应商 GlobalFoundries Inc.【原文：GlobalFoundries Inc., the biggest US-based provider of made-to-order chips, announced a plan to spend $16 billion to bolster domestic production.】

item.title: 印度反对亚行向巴基斯坦提供 8 亿美元贷款
item.description: 在上个月南亚两个邻国发生军事冲突之后，巴基斯坦不顾印度政府的反对，于本周二从亚洲开发银行获得了 8 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Pakistan secured an $800 million loan from the Asian Development Bank on Tuesday despite objections from India’s government following last month’s military conflict between the two South Asian neighbors.】

item.title: 如果特朗普的 "报复税 "成为法律，美国借款人将面临更高的利息
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收和支出法案中一项旨在惩罚外国投资者的措施也可能会提高一些美国借款人的利息成本。【原文：A measure in President Donald Trump’s tax and spending bill that’s meant to penalize foreign investors may also raise interest costs for some US borrowers.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国招聘速度降至两年来最慢
item.description: 由于商业服务、教育和卫生等行业减少了工作岗位，招聘速度降至两年来最慢，表明对工人的需求减弱。【原文：Hiring decelerated to the slowest pace in two years as sectors including business services and education and health shed jobs, pointing to a weakened demand for workers.】

item.title: Wedbush 的 Dan Ives 加入 ETF 浪潮，将分析师打造成品牌
item.description: 华尔街科技分析师丹-艾夫斯（Dan Ives）正借用他的个人品牌，推动人工智能热潮中的新 ETF，加入越来越多的金融界名人的行列，希望通过零售友好型投资基金来实现其行业声誉的货币化。【原文：Wall Street tech analyst Dan Ives is lending his personal brand to power a new ETF riding the artificial-intelligence boom, joining a growing pack of finance names looking to monetize their industry renown with retail-friendly investment funds.】

item.title: 贷款越来越便宜，新西兰房价却进一步下跌
item.description: 新西兰房价连续第二个月下跌，表明即使利率下降，房地产市场也缺乏动力。【原文：New Zealand house prices fell for a second straight month, suggesting the property market lacks momentum even as interest rates fall.】

item.title: 在米莱的紧缩政策下，退票飙升至五年新高
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的紧缩政策帮助稳定了阿根廷的经济，但消费者和企业面临的财政压力仍在不断增加。【原文：President Javier Milei’s austerity drive has helped steady Argentina’s economy, and yet, financial pressure keeps mounting on consumers and businesses.】

item.title: 中国呼吁法国帮助解决与欧盟的贸易分歧
item.description: 中国呼吁法国帮助解决与欧盟的贸易分歧，因为在与美国的紧张关系一触即发之际，中国政府正寻求巩固与欧盟的关系。【原文：China called on France to help resolve trade differences with the European Union, as Beijing seeks to shore up ties with the bloc amid simmering tensions with the US.】

item.title: 尼德姆因人工智能风险和 iPhone 升级周期受限下调苹果评级
item.description: 苹果公司股价在周三的盘前交易中下跌，表明这家 iPhone 制造商将延续 2025 年的疲软态势，因为华尔街仍对其增长前景和在人工智能领域的地位感到担忧。【原文：Apple Inc. shares fell in premarket trading on Wednesday, suggesting the iPhone maker would extend its 2025 weakness as Wall Street remains concerned about its growth prospects and position in the landscape for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 新银行股东批准可能进行 10 亿欧元首次公开募股的步骤
item.description: 据一位不愿透露姓名、熟悉内情的人士透露，Novo Banco SA 的股东批准了这家由美国私募股权公司 Lone Star 持有多数股权的葡萄牙贷款公司可能进行首次公开募股所需的步骤。【原文：Novo Banco SA’s shareholders approved steps needed for a possible initial public offering of the Portuguese lender, which is majority-owned by US private equity firm Lone Star, according to a person familiar with the matter who asked not to be named.】

item.title: 欧盟将于 6 月中旬推出终止俄罗斯能源进口的工具
item.description: 欧盟行政部门计划在本月中旬提交法规草案，以便在 2027 年底之前逐步停止进口俄罗斯能源。【原文：The European Union’s executive branch plans to present draft regulations in the middle of this month to phase out Russian energy imports by the end of 2027.】

item.title: Palantir 股价飙升，投资者丝毫不受天价估值的影响
item.description: 尽管 Palantir Technologies Inc. 是美股中估值最昂贵的公司之一，但投资者仍被其人工智能前景所吸引，该公司的突破性涨势没有丝毫放松的迹象。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s breakneck rally shows no sign of letting up as investors remain captivated by its artificial intelligence promise despite one of the most expensive valuations among US stocks.】

item.title: 加州屋顶太阳能梦想因账单上涨而变得渺茫
item.description:
为遏制飙升的电费，州政府再次寻求削减对家庭用户的激励措施。【原文：

The state again looks to cut incentives for home users in a push to curb soaring electricity rates.

】

item.title: 尽管特朗普提高了钢铁关税，欧盟仍认为美国谈判取得了进展
item.description: 马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）在与美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）会晤后表示，欧盟和美国正朝着贸易谈判的 "正确方向 "前进，但如果双方都想保持发展势头，美国对钢铁和铝进口的新征税并无益处。【原文：The European Union and the US are headed in the “right direction” in trade talks, though new American levies on steel and aluminum imports aren’t helpful if both sides want to maintain momentum, Maros Sefcovic said after meeting with US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer.】

item.title: 黄总理称新加坡公司关注菲律宾绿色能源项目
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪在访问马尼拉期间表示，新加坡公司有兴趣在菲律宾投资可再生能源项目。【原文：Singaporean companies are interested to invest in renewable energy projects in the Philippines, the city-state’s Prime Minister Lawrence Wong said during a visit to Manila.】

item.title: BayPine 同意收购法律咨询公司 Harbor 的股份
item.description: BayPine 同意收购 Harbor Global 的多数股权，Harbor Global 是一家为法律行业提供咨询和 IT 服务的公司。【原文：BayPine has agreed to acquire the majority stake in Harbor Global, a consultant and IT services firm catering to the legal industry.】

item.title: 南非财政部长等待通胀目标报告
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，他正在等待一份关于该国通胀目标分配的报告，他还没有决定是否要对其进行调整。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said he is waiting for a report on the country’s inflation-targeting dispensation and he hasn’t decided whether it should be adjusted.】

item.title: 直言不讳的韩国左派可能改变东亚平衡
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，彭博社驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注韩国的新总统。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor at Bloomberg in Sydney.
